tr_clockparser.name: TR_ClockParser
tr_clockparser.description: Plugin that parses seconds to clock string.

minimal.description: Return the smallest possible clock string. e.g.: Minimal(30) -> "30", Minimal(90) -> "01:30", Minimal(4830) -> "01:20:30"

mmss.description: Return the "MM:SS" clock string. e.g.: MMSS(30) -> "00:30", MMSS(90) -> "01:30", MMSS(4830) -> "80:30"

hhmmss.description: Return the "HH:MM:SS" clock string. e.g.: HHMMSS(30) -> "00:00:30", HHMMSS(90) -> "00:01:30", HHMMSS(4830) -> "01:20:30"

toseconds.description: Converts the specified clock string to seconds e.g.: "01:03:30" -> 3810, "15:30" -> 930, "30" -> 30

0.desc: String representation of time in one of the following formats: "HH:MM:SS", "MM:SS", "SS".
